description: This table contains the hospital account alternate final diagnoses from the hospital account (HAR) master file.   Alternate final diagnoses will be specified if hospital accounts are coded with two sets of ICD codes.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the hospital account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FIN_DX_ALT_ID
columns.description: The alternate final diagnoses stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: FIN_DX_ALT_EXCLD_YN
columns.description:
The alternate final diagnosis exclude from clinical reporting data.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: FIN_DX_ALT_POA_C_NAME
columns.description:
The alternate final diagnosis present on admission data.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Unknown


Clinically Undetermined


Exempt from POA reporting

columns.name: FIN_DX_ALT_CC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The alternate final diagnosis complication / comorbidity data.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


CC


No


MCC

columns.name: FIN_DX_ALT_HAC_YN
columns.description:
The alternate final diagnosis hospital acquired condition data.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: FIN_DX_ALT_AFDRG_YN
columns.description:
The alternate final diagnosis affects DRG data.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: FIN_DX_ALT_EXCLD_YN

columns.name: FIN_DX_ALT_SOI_C_NAME
columns.description:
The alternate final diagnosis severity of illness data.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Refinement not possible


Minor


Moderate


Major


Extreme


Principal Dx Used for SOI/ROM Calc


Excluded


Duplicate Diagnosis


Excluded Complication of Care

columns.name: FIN_DX_ALT_ROM_C_NAME
columns.description:
The alternate final diagnosis risk of mortality data.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: FIN_DX_ALT_SOI_C_NAME

columns.name: FIN_DX_ALT_AFSOI_YN
columns.description:
The alternate final diagnosis affects severity of illness data.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: FIN_DX_ALT_EXCLD_YN

columns.name: FIN_DX_ALT_AFROM_YN
columns.description:
The alternate final diagnosis affects risk of mortality data.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: FIN_DX_ALT_EXCLD_YN
